I applied for Reentry permit AUG197 in July9T much before I left USA in ticket not have any Air coupon a. i Then do time so I am sending documents OAUS regarding thirfe. virginia from Rugslegy in at my stay in INOUA FAIR of RUSS. 12, 97 & Hospital consultation is indian Doctor Stamped entry of arrived - Konsidebad, India on India stampert This in sho old on answer ACC. 11, 97. your querries, satifactorily Thruws Sinceres N.D. 56 (NARAIN D.
